assertValidStorageParams().details: Asserts that an epoch is between 5 and 30 days long.Asserts that 0 < cobb douglas alpha value <= 1.Asserts that a stake weight is <= 100%.Asserts that pools allow >= 1 maker.Asserts that all addresses are initialized.

attachStakingContract(address).details: Note that this is callable only by an authorized address.

params.data: An array of data that encodes a sequence of functions to call in the staking contracts.

params.newOwner: Address of the staking proxy owner.
params.stakingImplementation: Address of the staking contract to delegate calls to.

detachStakingContract().details: Note that this is callable only by an authorized address.

params.index: Index of target in authorities array.

transferOwnership(address).details: Change the owner of this contract.

StakingContractAttachedToProxy(address).notice: Emitted by StakingProxy when a staking contract is attached.

StakingContractDetachedFromProxy().notice: Emitted by StakingProxy when a staking contract is detached.

aggregatedStatsByEpoch(uint256).notice: Aggregated stats across all pools that generated fees with sufficient stake to earn rewards.

attachStakingContract(address).notice: Attach a staking contract; future calls will be delegated to the staking contract.

batchExecute(bytes[]).notice: Batch executes a series of calls to the staking contract.

cobbDouglasAlphaDenominator().notice: Denominator for cobb douglas alpha factor.

cobbDouglasAlphaNumerator().notice: Numerator for cobb douglas alpha factor.

grgReservedForPoolRewards().notice: The GRG balance of this contract that is reserved for pool reward payouts.

minimumPoolStake().notice: Minimum amount of stake required in a pool to collect rewards.

poolIdByRbPoolAccount(address).notice: Mapping from RigoBlock pool subaccount to pool Id of rigoblock pool

poolStatsByEpoch(bytes32,uint256).notice: Stats for each pool that generated fees with sufficient stake to earn rewards.

rewardsByPoolId(bytes32).notice: mapping from pool ID to reward balance of members

validPops(address).notice: Registered RigoBlock Proof_of_Performance contracts, capable of paying protocol fees.
